div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, wk. of Apr. 9, 1892. p. 193. [FINE COLLECTION]

body.p: At the annual meeting of the Sinai Congregation, which took place last Monday night at the K.A.M. Temple, the handsome sum of $9,085.50 was collected from the members, for the United Hebrew Charities. The amount being 7/12 of the entire contributions made to this organization. The sum of $500 was donated by the Congregation to the Executive Committee in Aid of the Russian Refugees.
